title: Sara in the Army
description: In the not too distant future, WW111 has erupted and the United States is battling unknown enemies within its own borders. Sara is drafted just before she completes her medical degree to become a field medic on the California front lines. The world isn't the only thing at war, however, as Sara begins to fall for the Lieutenant Colonel of her unit while still fighting to remember the husband she lost only a short year before.
author: Brenda Hodnett
